entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
